skillTree.name: Croq'ilac
skillTree.description: This ancient creature is one of the few ancient razordons remaining, and has seen in Zlatgar a natural leader of the hunt, choosing to follow him on its path.

skillTree.name: Volcanic Spear
skillTree.description: Crafted from the obsidian extracted from a Volcano and imbued with the Slann's magic, this spaer can cut through any armor, and melt both metal and flesh on its touch.

skillTree.name: Obedience Brings Victory!
skillTree.description: Orders must be followed and the chain of command honoured; only then will the Great Plan be served.

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Honoured Elder
skillTree.description: Those Saurus not lost to war may live to a great age - their long service esteemed and respected by younger Lizardmen hungry for experience.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Saurus and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -5% for Temple Guards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Huanchi
skillTree.description: "Cousin of darkness, Huanchi's priests too shall dwell in twilight."

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Hunter of Huanchi
skillTree.description: Zlatgar's unrelenting hunt is blessed by the Jaguar God, strengthening it's resolve.

effects.description:
Attribute: Woodsman and Vanguard for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Trapper's Net
skillTree.description: A strong grip around the prey's body, that comes with the sudden realization of imminent death.

skillTree.name: Desert Tactics
skillTree.description: Following his General's example, the saurus leaded by Zlatgar use use minimal equipment, to move through the desert unnoticed.

skillTree.name: Leader of the Hunting Pack
skillTree.description: As one of the greatest of its kind, Croq'ilac's presence bolsters his pack into ferocious creatures.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Neverending Hunt
skillTree.description: The enemies of the Old Ones are many, and he will not rest until every last one of them is hunted down.

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +25%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Apex Predator
skillTree.description: The Desert Stalker is on the prowl, and the Southlands are his hunting ground.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +4% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +7% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hunt Leader
skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +4% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Geomantic Sustenance
skillTree.description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Gifts of the Jungle
skillTree.description: Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: The Desert Stalker
backgroundSkills.description: This brilliant tactician has been dispatched by the Slann to search for the Nemesis Crown. Zlatgar is a fierce warrior and an expert at surviving hostile climates, finding hidden paths, and moving via secret routes.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +7 when fighting in desert terrain
	(Lord's army)

items.name: Volcanic Spear
items.description: Crafted from the obsidian extracted from a Volcano and imbued with the Slann's magic, this spaer can cut through any armor, and melt both metal and flesh on its touch.

items.name: Croq'ilac
items.description: This ancient creature is one of the few ancient razordons remaining, and has seen in Zlatgar a natural leader of the hunt, choosing to follow him on its path.
